5.title: PhotoNim - a CPU RayTracer written in Nim

6.title: Usage
6.content: nimble build . This command generates in the root directory an executable called PhotoNim./PhotoNim --help PhotoNim: a CPU raytracer written in Nim. Usage: ./PhotoNim pfm2png <input> [<output>] [--alpha=<alpha> --gamma=<gamma>] Options: --alpha=<alpha> Color renormalization factor. [default: 0.18] --gamma=<gamma> Gamma correction factor. [default: 1.0] -h --help Show this helper screen. --version Show PhotoNim version.

7.title: Contributing
7.content: If you want to contribute to the project, you can open a pull requests or use the issue tracker to suggest any code implementations or report bugs. Any contributions are welcome! .

8.title: License
8.content: The code is released under the terms of the GNU General Public License v3.0, see the LICENSE.

12.title: Installing from source
12.content: git clone https://github.com/Negrini085/PhotoNim.git cd PhotoNim nimble build . This will produce an executable PhotoNim at the base of the project directory.
